Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing regulated via national DNC
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: Contacts to numbers on DNC only with explicit post-registration consent by the subscriber; otherwise prohibited.
Known_Exceptions(notes): Law and AAIP guidance focus on subscribers (holders/authorized users).
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: No specific caller ID prefixes mandated nationally.
Recent_Changes(2024+): 2024 AAIP resolution updates sanctioning/procedures for DNC and DP infractions.
Primary_Sources: Ley 26.951 (Boletín Oficial) https://www.boletinoficial.gob.ar/detalleAviso/primera/308122/20240524 | AAIP No Llame https://nollame.aaip.gob.ar | Texto Ley 26.951 (Infoleg/SAIJ) https://servicios.infoleg.gob.ar/infolegInternet/anexos/225000-229999/225930/norma.htm
Notes_for_Product: Treat mixed datasets as consumer by default; check DNC before any B2C/B2B-to-individual calls; announce recording.

Regime_B2C: No specific consumer telemarketing regime found.
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: No statutory DNC; general telecom law protects secrecy of communications.
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: No national caller ID/telemarketing prefixes identified.
Notes_for_Product: Conservative: apply consumer-style quiet hours and disclosures; avoid automated burst campaigns; obtain explicit consent for recordings.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing partially regulated (sector DNC; anti-spoofing/authenticated calls)
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: DNC may be bypassed only with explicit, provable consent.
Known_Exceptions(notes): State-level DNC lists may also apply (e.g., PROCON).
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: 0303 prefix requirement revoked (Aug 2025); Anatel implementing STIR/SHAKEN authenticated/identified calling (Origem Verificada).
Recent_Changes(2024+): 2025: Anatel revokes 0303 obligation; deadlines for authentication tightened for large originators.
Primary_Sources: Agência Brasil (revocation) https://agenciabrasil.ebc.com.br/geral/noticia/2025-08/anatel-revoga-obrigatoriedade-do-uso-do-prefixo-0303-em-ligacoes | Anatel: Autenticação e Identificação de Chamadas https://www.gov.br/anatel/pt-br/regulado/acompanhamento-e-controle/autenticacao-e-identificacao-de-chamadas | Anatel: Não Me Perturbe https://www.gov.br/anatel/pt-br/consumidor/telemarketing/nao-me-perturbe
Notes_for_Product: Enforce CLI authentication (STIR/SHAKEN) where available; don’t rely on 0303; consult NMP for participating sectors; record with announcement + opt-out.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing identified via mandatory prefixes; per-company opt-out via SERNAC
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: Respect per-company opt-out preferences if collected.
Recent_Changes(2024+): 2025: SUBTEL enforces 600/809 numbering to identify commercial/mass calls.
Primary_Sources: SUBTEL release (12 Aug 2025) https://www.subtel.gob.cl/desde-este-miercoles-las-llamadas-comerciales-y-masivas-deberan-llevar-los-prefijos-600-y-809-para-su-identificacion/ | SUBTEL 'Prefijos Únicos' explainer https://www.subtel.gob.cl/prefijos-unicos/ | Gobierno de Chile notice https://www.gob.cl/noticias/parte-hoy-conoce-prefijos-identificar-llamadas-no-deseadas/
Notes_for_Product: Product must present banner explaining 600/809 logic; tag unsolicited campaigns as 809; keep disclosure/recording prompts.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing regulated; hours fixed by Ley 2300/2023
Regime_B2B: Mixed/Unclear for B2B (treat contacts to individuals as B2C)
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: Existing relationship allows service/contract notifications, but marketing must respect RNE & time windows.
Known_Exceptions(notes): Financial collections also restricted by Ley 2300 within the same hours.
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: Caller ID prefix not mandated; CRC advancing anti-spam controls.
Recent_Changes(2024+): 2024–2025: CRC expands RNE scope & procedures; Ley 2300 in force.
Primary_Sources: Ley 2300/2023 (Función Pública) https://www.funcionpublica.gov.co/eva/gestornormativo/norma.php?i=219399 | CRC – Registro de Números Excluidos https://www.crcom.gov.co/es/gestion/rne | RNE Términos https://tramitescrcom.gov.co/tramites/publico/rne/terminosRNE.xhtml
Notes_for_Product: Always schedule within legal window; check RNE before every campaign (incl. ER). Play recording/monitoring notice.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing restricted: identification & prior express consent required for commercial/publicity/proselitist calls
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: Consent-driven calling; ER not a blanket exemption if consent missing.
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: ARCOTEL mandates identifiable numbers for such calls.
Recent_Changes(2024+): 2020–2025: ARCOTEL policy + DP Regulation in force.
Primary_Sources: ARCOTEL release (Min. Telecom) https://www.telecomunicaciones.gob.ec/nueva-normativa-exige-la-identificacion-de-llamadas-comerciales-publicitarias-o-proselitistas/ | LOPDP (Ley Orgánica DP) https://www.finanzaspopulares.gob.ec/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/ley_organica_de_proteccion_de_datos_personales.pdf | Reglamento LOPDP (2023) https://www.cosede.gob.ec/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/REGLAMENTO-GENERAL-A-LA-LEY-ORG%C3%81NICA-DE-PROTECCION-DE-DATOS-PERSONALES_compressed-1.pdf
Notes_for_Product: Gate outbound to contacts with stored consent; include AI/recording disclosure per global setting.

Primary_Sources: NTA Guyana https://www.nta.gy/ | CCAC (Consumer Commission) https://ccac.gov.gy/

Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Known_Exceptions(notes): If existing customer, contact allowed only Mon–Fri 08:00–18:00; otherwise respect registry.
Last_Verified (ISO date): Registry fully in force and expanding.
Notes_for_Product: SEDECO – No Molestar https://nomolestar.sedeco.gov.py | SEDECO sitio https://www.paraguay.gov.py/instituciones/sedeco
column21: Always check registry; restrict ER scheduling to 08–18 weekdays; show opt-out.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing prohibited without prior consent (Ley 32323/2025)
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: Existing customer contact for service may be allowed by DP/consumer rules, but marketing requires prior express consent.
Notes_for_Product: Treat all outbound marketing as consent-only; log consent proof; include clear opt-out on SMS/email.

Regime_B2C: Consumer telemarketing regulated via national DNC
Regime_B2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
Existing_Relationship_Exemption(plain_te: ER allowed if explicit consent documented or arising from the contract; still consult DNC and respect hours.
Known_Exceptions(notes): Applies to calls, SMS, messaging apps.
CallerID/Prefix_Rules: “No Llame” national; no special prefixes mandated.
Primary_Sources: URSEC FAQ (horarios) https://www.gub.uy/unidad-reguladora-servicios-comunicaciones/institucional/preguntas-frecuentes/registro-nacional-llame | IMPO Decreto 132/022 https://www.impo.com.uy/bases/decretos/132-2022/6 | Trámite URSEC https://www.gub.uy/tramites/consulta-registro-nacional-no-llame
Notes_for_Product: Always check DNC and schedule within legal window; store ER consent evidence 4+ years.
